name: sausagedelivery.vl
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD to move (zqsd should work aswell)

Mouse to aim

LMB to shoot

F11,F to toggle Fullscreen

E to interact

HOW TO PLAY:

You are a german chef  who grills collects sausages in a vulcano land.

Move around and use your flame thrower to first grill and then kill sausages.

Press [E] near a sausage to pick it up.

When you press [E] near the backbag (a little arrow points towards it) you deliver all of your picked up sausages to dimension C137 (our dimension) through a portal inside the backbag.

You get coins for every delivered sausage (the big weisswurst gives 2 coins) .

CREDITS:

Font:  Lana Ro

Music and some sounds: WOWIE resource pack

Art: All made by me :)

SAUSAGES:

Bratwurst: The normal default sausage

Vienna sausage: Is faster but also faster to grill and kill

Weisswurst (aka. big chungus): Slower but harder to grill and kill, gives 2 coins on delivery

VIMJAM3:

This game was made for the third Vim Jam

Theme: Turn up the heat

usage: You have a Flame Thrower

Focus: Multi-Use

usage: You can either use your flame thrower to grill the sausages to earn some coins or kill them to defend yourself
